## MetaManager gdrive ls

List current or given Drive directory

### Synopsis

Lists files and folders at the current Drive directory (see "gdrive pwd") or at the given path. Path is relative to current directory unless it starts with "/". With no argument, lists current directory.

```
MetaManager gdrive ls [path] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for ls
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
  -d, --debug   enable debug logging
```
